entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpkyvny8_0/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:DevelopmentInProcess with a value of 1,196,582,000 is represented as a child of us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet with a value of 5,033,527,000 in the companies extension taxonomy role 1001000 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED BALANCE SHEETS. The element us-gaap:DevelopmentInProcess however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:DevelopmentInProcess as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet and the child element us-gaap:DevelopmentInProcess.
The properties of this us-gaap:DevelopmentInProcess fact are:
Period :2017-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC4 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1498828/000162828019002143/hhc-20181231.xml 11481
